basics.name: Saurabh Tiwari
basics.label: Software Development Engineer
basics.description: Hey, I'm Saurabh Tiwari, a Software Development Engineer based in Mumbai, India. Proficient in backend technologies, I specialize in creating efficient, scalable solutions with Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.js.
basics.summary: Experienced backend developer leveraging Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.js to create scalable solutions. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, CI/CD, Docker, and Terraform.

work.summary: Developed scalable backend architectures, integrated APIs with frontend services, implemented authentication, and resolved technical issues.
highlights: Collaborated with frontend developers to integrate backend services seamlessly.
Implemented authentication mechanisms such as JWT and OAuth 2.0.

projects.name: B2B Sales Management System
projects.description: Developed a sales management system for B2B transactions including inventory management, order processing, and CRM functionalities.
highlights: Implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js.
Handled user authentication, product catalog management, and order tracking.

projects.name: Jio Local Distributor (JLD)
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive system for local distributors to manage sales and inventory.
highlights: Handled distributor accounts, inventory management, and reporting using Node.js and MongoDB.
Created a dashboard for distributors to track sales and inventory using React.js.

education.institution: Gyan Ganga Institute of Technology and Sciences
